RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp

RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp Class Reference

#include <terminalapp.h>

Inheritance diagram for RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp:

[legend]
Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The Base class of the terminal API.

This class uses S-Lang.

A dialog can be set with showDialog(Dialog*)

Definition at line 66 of file terminalapp.h.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::init (  ) 

The initializer of the Singleton.

It sets the timeout private variable to 2, initialize the message string and draw the message box.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::closeDialog (  ) 

Close the current dialog.

The showingDialog value is set to false. The dialog is destructed and its pointer is set to NULL.

Definition at line 74 of file terminalapp.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::initColors (  )  [private]

Initialize the SLang colors.

  • Color 0 is White on Blue : the desktop
  • Color 1 is Blue on White : it is used for the message box
  • Color 2 is Black on Cyan : it is the menu color
  • Color 3 is Red on Cyan : it is the menu highlight color
  • Color 4 is White on Black : it is a selected menu
  • Color 5 is Cyan on Black : it is a selected menu highlight
  • Color 6 is Green on blue : it is a selected window
  • Color 7 is Blue on gray : it is use for the text widgets
  • Color 8 is white on lightgray : it is used as dialog border 1
  • Color 9 is black on lightgray : it is used as dialog border 2 and title
  • Color 10 is white on cyan : it is used in the listview headers

Definition at line 142 of file terminalapp.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::drawKeycodeBox (  )  [private]

Draw the keycode box.

The keycode box is a little space at the roght of the messagebox, providing the last pressed keycode to be printed.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::high ( bool  b  )  [private]

Highlight temporaly the text for menus if b is true.

The menu is highlight with the color 3. A normal menu is drawn with the color 2.

Parameters:
b if true, set the menu highlight color, otherwise, set the normal menu index.

Draw a menu box with items according to its tShortCut.

Definition at line 576 of file terminalapp.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::keyHit (  )  [private]

Treats the keyboard entry.

If the TAB key is hitten, it calls keyTabHit(), otherwise, it calls keyArrowInMenu( int ).

Definition at line 723 of file terminalapp.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::keyTabHit (  )  [private]

The TAB key event holder.

It call the current Window's Layout::getNextFocus() method.

Definition at line 837 of file terminalapp.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::sendKeyToCurrentWindow ( int  ch  )  [private]

Send the keycodes received to the current Window.

Iterates through windowList and if a Window::isSelected() returns true, send it the keycode.

Parameters:
ch the keycode to send to teh selected Window

) [private]

Draw a menu item.

Draw the string at the given position. If hl is true, the Item is currently selected.

Member Data Documentation

int RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::timeout [private]

The waiting time in milliseconds to check if input is pending.

This is the parameter send to the SLang_input_pending SLang function.

int RainbruRPG::Terminal::TerminalApp::currentSubMenu [private]

This index is the submenu selected in the menu currentMenu.
